article_metadata.news-keywords: modesto bee, opinion pages, steve taylor, kalinda, medicare, obamacare, aca
article_metadata.description: I swept the stray Medi-Cal card off the kitchen counter on my way to the filing cabinet without really looking at it. We’re supposed to keep our foster kid’s records together, and the least we can do for these poor, displaced children is provide some order and structure.
article_metadata.title: Steve Taylor: Better health care, like it or not | The Modesto Bee
